tool.name: vg deconstruct
tool.description: construct a dynamic succinct variation graph
tool.command: vg deconstruct --path '${','.join([$p for $p in $path])}' --path-prefix '${','.join([$p for $p in $path_prefix])}' --alt-prefix '${','.join([$p for $p in $alt_path])}' #if $snarls: --snarls '$snarls' #end if $path_traversals ## -e --threads=\${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1} '$input'

param.label: A reference path to deconstruct against
All paths beginning with this value used as reference
Non-reference paths beginning with with this value get lumped together to same sample in VCF
Only consider traversals that correspond to paths in the grpah

tool.help:
variation graph (vg) deconstruct module ---------------------------------------
Creates VCF records for Snarls present in a graph (relative to a chosen reference path).
